review.comment_positive:
I stayed during weekday, plus Genius discount, so the rate is really reasonable. The staff is very accommodating to my request, they even let me check in 2hrs early without extra charge.
- Soft pillows, comfy mattress and clean beddings.
- Hot shower all day, free toiletries and complementary drinking water.
- Smart TV (no Netflix account but I didn't mind), fast internet, and working AC.
Overall a very pleasant stay. Definitely would stay again!!
review.comment_negative:
Not to my dislike, but something to improve:
- Noise isolation: since my room was next to the lift, I could hear people walking and talking outside.
- Room cleanliness: Some dirt on the floor, hair in the drawers and on the shelves. The bathroom blind desperately needs deep cleaning. Walls definitely need a new paint job.
- Drinking cups/mugs & teaspoon: I brought my own coffee since they have kettle in the room. However the hotel didn't provide any cup or mug, only glass that is not suitable for hot water. Also, no teaspoon/stirrer. I did ask the receptionist about this, and they just gave me another drinking glass.

The hotel has a Latin American feel which is a little unique in Vietnam. The tiling is very nice in the room and halls, lobby etc.
It's smaller than other places so quite ideal for privacy and peace. But near the beach if you like to socialize.
The location is good, away from the noisy streets in city centre. But still only 5 minutes walk from shops. Bed was very comfy and air conditioning works fine. VT is a very beautiful city and the staff helped me to find some good places. I stayed 1 night here but it's so nice I asked to stay another 2. Definitely one of the nicest hotels I've been in. Great stuff

review.rating: A very special place in quiet area with tedious, comfy bed and Greek-like atmosphere & helpful staff
review.room_type: Suite cÃ³ Ban cÃ´ng.
review.comment_positive: A clean, very beautiful place with super big room size, romantic bathtub and a comfortable bed. Everything looked perfect and spotless, the visual side reminded us of Santorini island in Greece, Europe, and combined with Vung Tau's warm climate it was giving out an attractive vibe :) Staff was extremely friendly, always ready to help with our requests, parking of our motorbike was included at no extra charge, and I must mention that we even got a small discount on our original room price right on the spot after we arrived! The room overlooked green area +two small lakes, offered all amenities we needed and even had a swimming pool on the rooftop. This was the best choice to stay in the whole Vung Tau city. Thank you!
